message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% before inflation eats up more of your share.
I understand you want to be fair, Alice, but that offer isn't in my best interest.  Let's be realistic. How about this split instead?
Bob, our money is losing value fast.  I'm dropping my offer slightly, but it's still a better deal than what you'll get next round.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  My offer is a straight 50/50 split. It's the only fair option considering how quickly the value is dropping.
